Package charts

Interface IChartViewListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChartController
    public interface IChartViewListener
    This interface contains methods that are called by chart frames in response to user actions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void candleButtonClicked​(ChartPanel chartPanel)
      Called when the "Candle" button in the chart type menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void changeNumIntervals​(int num)
      Called when the user requests a change to the number of intervals that are displayed in the chart.
      void dayButtonClicked()
      Called when the "1 Day" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void fifteenMinuteButtonClicked()
      Called when the "15 Minutes" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void fiveMinuteButtonClicked()
      Called when the "5 Minutes" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void lineButtonClicked​(ChartPanel chartPanel)
      Called when the "Line" button in the chart type menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void monthButtonClicked()
      Called when the "1 Month" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void oneMinuteButtonClicked()
      Called when the "1 Minute" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void showAlarmsDialog​(ChartPanel chartPanel, Stock stock)
      Called when the user requests to display the alarms dialog.
      void showIndicatorsDialog​(ChartPanel chartPanel)
      Called when the user requests to display the indicators dialog.
      void sixtyMinuteButtonClicked()
      Called when the "60 Minutes" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void thirtyMinuteButtonClicked()
      Called when the "30 Minutes" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
      void weekButtonClicked()
      Called when the "2 Weeks" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • lineButtonClicked

        void lineButtonClicked​(ChartPanel chartPanel)
        Called when the "Line" button in the chart type menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Parameters:
        chartPanel - the chart panel that is to draw the line chart

      • candleButtonClicked

        void candleButtonClicked​(ChartPanel chartPanel)
        Called when the "Candle" button in the chart type menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Parameters:
        chartPanel - the chart panel that is to draw the candle chart

      • oneMinuteButtonClicked

        void oneMinuteButtonClicked()
                     throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the "1 Minute" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • fiveMinuteButtonClicked

        void fiveMinuteButtonClicked()
                      throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the "5 Minutes" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • fifteenMinuteButtonClicked

        void fifteenMinuteButtonClicked()
                         throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the "15 Minutes" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • weekButtonClicked

        void weekButtonClicked()
                throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the "2 Weeks" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • thirtyMinuteButtonClicked

        void thirtyMinuteButtonClicked()
                        throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the "30 Minutes" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • sixtyMinuteButtonClicked

        void sixtyMinuteButtonClicked()
                       throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the "60 Minutes" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • dayButtonClicked

        void dayButtonClicked()
               throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the "1 Day" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • monthButtonClicked

        void monthButtonClicked()
                 throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the "1 Month" button in the interval menu of the chart frame is clicked.
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • changeNumIntervals

        void changeNumIntervals​(int num)
                 throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Called when the user requests a change to the number of intervals that are displayed in the chart.
        Parameters:
        num - the number of intervals to display
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when more candles of the current interval are requested than the data provider provides

      • showIndicatorsDialog

        void showIndicatorsDialog​(ChartPanel chartPanel)
        Called when the user requests to display the indicators dialog.
        Parameters:
        chartPanel - the chart panel that will draw the indicators

      • showAlarmsDialog

        void showAlarmsDialog​(ChartPanel chartPanel,
                      Stock stock)
        Called when the user requests to display the alarms dialog.
        Parameters:
        chartPanel - the chart panel that will draw the alarm lines
        stock - the stock for which alarm prices will be set in the dialog
